overview: This film traces the portrait of the Argentinian accordionist Raul Barboza in various aspects of his current life, through interviews, rehearsals, concerts, travels . We follow him on various trips and tours, particularly in Argentina where Barboza returns at least once a year to find his roots, his emotional 'landscape'. Throughout the documentary, the music and lyrics of Raul Barboza convey a sense of permanent osmosis between nature and the very principles of Raul's life.
title: Raúl Barboza Live in Argentina
